Unit 10: Software Quality Monitoring in Python

  • Unit 10 ePortfolio Activity - Reflection on Software Quality

This unit had us do an eportfolio activity on ‚Äúreflection on software quality‚Äù, requiring reading of the article ‚ÄúFactors in Software Quality, Volume 1, Concepts and Definitions of Software Quality‚Äù by McCall, A., et al. (1977), finding and reading a second more recent article on software quality, then discuss the major differences in relation to software quality between the two articles.

There was also a seminar on code quality in this unit.
